article_title: Entegra Power Wins Confirmation of Bankruptcy Emergence Plan
article_text:
Power-plant owner Entegra Power Group LLC won swift confirmation Friday of a Chapter 11 plan that chops $750 million worth of debt from its $1.5 billion balance sheet.

Entegra already had the votes in hand to get its plan before a judge when it filed for bankruptcy protection Aug. 4, clearing the way for an uncontested confirmation session before Judge Peter Walsh Friday in the U.S. Bankruptcy Court in Wilmington, Del. Judge Walsh...

article_summary:
Judge Walsh...
Power-plant owner Entegra Power Group LLC won swift confirmation Friday of a Chapter 11 plan that chops $750 million worth of debt from its $1.5 billion balance sheet.
Entegra already had the votes in hand to get its plan before a judge when it filed for bankruptcy protection Aug. 4, clearing the way for an uncontested confirmation session before Judge Peter Walsh Friday in the U.S. Bankruptcy Court in Wilmington, Del.
